Articles.Content:
Hello all im new and noob atm... i start playing game with stock but after few mins i figure there must be lots of thing for this game and chek this forum... i saw awsome mods here... and some plugins wich i tought making things work in the game am i wrong?

than i installed that ones first;

-MuMech (MechJeb)

-PowerTech

than after i install satelite pack from this page

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/13692-Mechanical-Mouse-Industries-Kethane-Payload-Packs-Released%21%21%21

they work well and great but im confused now for what i need to add this game next?

i wonder is there any enviroment mod for this game for example lights? hi res planet textures / maybe sound (wich mod?)

and what other initial mods/plugins wich every one of you using essentialy pls help

Edited August 20, 2012 by ashrutoraman

I like the NovaPunch pack. There are no environmental packs or hi-res textures.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
